mdl-product.title: Products
mdl-product.productFeaturesTooltip: Product features depend on the product type. Changing features will affect UOM.
mdl-product.definePackaging: Define packaging options for this variant
mdl-product.baseUomDescription: This is the base unit of measure (UOM) of the product, and also the storage unit (if stockable feature is enabled). Should choose the smallest unit to avoid conversion errors.
mdl-product.baseUomWarning: Note: This unit cannot be changed after creating the product.
mdl-product.captureAttributes: Capture additional attributes for this variant
mdl-product.duplicateUomMessage: This UOM is already selected in another field

errors.baseUnitOfMeasureRequired: Base unit of measure is required
errors.atLeastOneVariantRequired: At least one variant is required
